item.title: Mobile visual clothing search
item.description: More detail can easily be written here using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: Margin Note in Arithmetica
item.description: I have discovered a truly marvellous proof of this, which this margin is too narrow to contain: There are no positive integers such that $x^n + y^n = z^n$ for $ n>2 $.
